Claire Winfrey is a PhD candidate co-advised by Noah Fierer and Julian Resasco at the University of Colorado Boulder. She researches the spatial patterns of microorganisms in the soil and near-surface atmosphere, considering physiological traits and environmental conditions including habitat fragmentation to understand why microbes are where they are.
